title: Software Architect Roadmap
description: A comprehensive guide to becoming a software architect, including core concepts, skills, and hands-on projects.

modules.title: Understand the Basics
modules.description: Learn the fundamentals of software architecture and the architect's role.

modules.title: Responsibilities & Skills
modules.description: Discover the key responsibilities and skills required.

modules.title: Levels of Architecture
modules.description: Explore different levels of architecture in organizations.

modules.title: Technical Skills & Tools
modules.description: Develop skills in modern tools and methodologies.

steps.title: Certifications (LeSS, SaFE, PMI, ITIL, Prince2, RUP)

modules.title: Patterns and Design Principles
modules.description: Master software design and architectural patterns.

steps.title: CQRS, Eventual Consistency, ACID, CAP Theorem

modules.title: Architectures
modules.description: Study different architecture styles for modern systems.

modules.title: Databases and Data Engineering
modules.description: Get familiar with database architectures and data engineering tools.

steps.title: SQL & NoSQL Databases, ETL, Hadoop, Spark

modules.title: Programming Languages & Frameworks
modules.description: Learn the primary languages, frameworks, and modeling techniques.

modules.title: Security
modules.description: Understand security principles and practices for architects.

modules.title: Enterprise Software & Operations
modules.description: Review enterprise systems, operations, and cloud foundations.

steps.title: Enterprise Systems & Operations (SAP, Salesforce, MS Dynamics, IBM BPM, etc.)
Networks & Cloud Operations (Proxies, Firewalls, OSI, IaaC, Containers, CI/CD)

projects.title: Design a Microservices Architecture
projects.description: Design a microservices-based architecture for an e-commerce system with authentication, catalog, order, and payment services.

projects.title: Architect a Scalable Data Platform
projects.description: Design a scalable data platform using SQL/NoSQL, ETL pipelines, and data warehousing.

projects.title: Secure Authentication System
projects.description: Build a secure authentication and authorization system using OAuth2/JWT for a web platform.

projects.title: Enterprise Integration Patterns
projects.description: Design an integration solution for connecting heterogeneous enterprise systems (ERP, CRM, BPM).
